title: How to Make Chashu (Recipe) チャーシュー・煮豚の作り方（レシピ）
description:
Chashu - Melt in your mouth pork belly braised in sweet and savory soy sauce based sauce.  Sear with torch to enhance flavor and enjoy with ramen!

For the complete recipe:
https://www.justonecookbook.com/homemade-chashu/

Ingredients:

¾ lb. pork belly block
1 tsp. salt
½ Tbsp. oil
2 inch ginger, sliced
1 Tokyo negi (or leaks/green onions)

Seasonings
⅔ cup water
⅓ cup sake
⅓ cup soy sauce
3 Tbsp. sugar

★ SUBTITLES - THANK YOU!!!!! ★ 
SPANISH (Latin America) by Kokichi Uehara
CHINESE by Lulu Lee 


Music courtesy of Audio Network: "True To You"

http://www.audionetwork.com/browse/m/track/true-to-you_50950?

Spanish Subtitle by Kokichi Uehara - Thank you!
